Please don't use the aero overlay for any testing of aero forces, it's known to be inaccurate, enable "Display aero data in action menu's" via the debug screen instead.

The line you see is body lift, and KSP is known to misreport lift and thrust on mirrored parts when using the CoT, CoM, CoL and aero forces displays, as it only uses the original part and not its symmetry clones for some things, this is easily seen in the editor when placing Rockomax 24-77 Twitch engines in symmetry, the CoT indicator will point to the side.

And please reproduce this in stock, addons affect KSP even if they aren't in use.

As for Onchyophora, too much canard and not enough rudder.
